api_list.name: Generate QR code
api_list.description: Generate a QR code image with specified content and size.

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: Text content that should be encoded in QR code.

optional_parameters.name: recovery
optional_parameters.description:
Recovery level. Possible values:
- `L`: 7% error recovery
- `M`: 15% error recovery (default)
- `Q`: 25% error recovery
- `H`: 30% error recovery

optional_parameters.name: disable_border
optional_parameters.description: Disable the QR Code border. Default is false (border is enabled).

optional_parameters.name: bgcolor
optional_parameters.description: Background color in HEX format. Default is white (`ffffff`).

optional_parameters.name: fgcolor
optional_parameters.description: Foreground color in HEX format. Default is black (`000000`).

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the QR image in pixels. Should be less than or equal 5000. Default is 500.
